content: तपस्विन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Practising penance, devout. {@--2@} Poor, miserable, helpless, pitiable; सा तपस्विनी निर्वृता भवतु <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>Māl. 3</ls>; <ls>N. 1. 135.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An ascetic; तपस्विसामान्यमवेक्षणीया <ls>R. 14. 67.</ls> {@--2@} A mendicant, pauper. {@--3@} An epithet of <ls>Nārada.</ls> {@--4@} A sparrow. --नी {@--1@} A female ascetic. {@--2@} A poor or wretched woman.
